channel.title: Help with adding Dragon Claw special

item.title: Help with adding Dragon Claw special
item.dc:creator: @lilman09 lilman09
item.description:
@lilman09 wrote:

so i have tried some guides to add dragon claw special but when i get up to this part of finding this code

[code]if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 5698 && specialAmount > 24){
startAnimation(0x426);
specialAtkNPC(false, 0, 252, 0x426);
getHit(25);
DDS2Damg = true;
DDStimer = 1;
startAnimation(0x426);
usingSpecial = true;
specialAmount -= 25;
int j = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absX;
int k = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absY;
int l = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].playerLevel[playerHitpoints];
}

[/code]

it’s not there… i have tried other guides before without that but when i click the special bar nothing happens…
i have been coding for a month now so i am still a beginner.
thanks!

Read full topic
item.source: Help with adding Dragon Claw special
